title: JavaScript Basics
article: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, functions, and control flow.

title: Async Programming in Node.js
article: Discover how to handle asynchronous operations in Node.js using callbacks, promises, and async/await.

title: Understanding Closures in JavaScript
article: Explore closures in JavaScript, how they work, and practical use cases for encapsulation and data privacy.

title: Mastering Array Methods
article: A deep dive into JavaScript array methods like map, filter, reduce, and forEach with practical examples.

title: Introduction to Express.js
article: Get started with Express.js, the popular Node.js web framework, and build your first REST API.

title: Promises vs. Async/Await
article: Compare JavaScript promises and async/await syntax, and learn when to use each for asynchronous code.
